医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
拥抱无塑料七月：Bedfont® Scientific Limited 对可持续未来的承诺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Embracing-Plastic-Free-July-The-Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Commitment-to-a-Sustainable-Future.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Embracing-Plastic-Free-July-The-Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Commitment-to-a-Sustainable-Future.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a475c16-e974-4b44-91cc-cf3aea6c5938 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 05:12:00 -0400 Embracing Plastic Free July: The Bedfont® Scientific Limited Commitment to a Sustainable Future.
研究显示肝脏的防御机制阻碍慢性乙型肝炎的免疫力在慢性乙型肝炎中，肝脏含有可以破坏乙型肝炎病毒感染细胞但不活跃的免疫细胞。慕尼黑工业大学 (TUM) 的一个团队发现，肝脏中的细胞血管会启动一个“睡眠计时器”，从而关闭免疫细胞。针对这一机制可能是免疫疗法的起点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Livers-defense-mechanism-hinders-immunity-in-chronic-hepatitis-B-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Livers-defense-mechanism-hinders-immunity-in-chronic-hepatitis-B-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e27fec68-0705-46e1-89b1-54c4d3a00121 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 02:45:20 -0400 Liver's defense mechanism hinders immunity in chronic hepatitis B, study reveals
先进成像揭示 AMD 隐性视力丧失波恩大学医院 (UKB) 与波恩大学合作的新研究首次表明，年龄相关性黄斑变性 (AMD) 患者的某些早期变化可能导致可测量的局部视力丧失。这一发现可能有助于改善老年患者这种眼病的治疗和监测，否则这种眼病会慢慢导致中枢性失明，并有助于测试新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Advanced-imaging-reveals-hidden-vision-loss-in-AMD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Advanced-imaging-reveals-hidden-vision-loss-in-AMD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10ea4d14-fcfc-467d-8515-5a94890d4c98 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 02:05:40 -0400 Advanced imaging reveals hidden vision loss in AMD
现有药物有望治疗常见肝病巴塞罗那大学领导的一项研究建议使用称为 pemafibrate 的药物来治疗与代谢紊乱相关的肝病，代谢紊乱是世界上最常见的肝脏病理学，影响四分之一的人。该药物早已在日本上市，用于另一种用途：改善高脂血症患者的血脂水平，高脂血症是糖尿病患者的常见病症。然而现在，它可以帮助解决这种严重的肝脏疾病，这种疾病仍然没有具体的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Existing-drug-shows-promise-for-treating-common-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Existing-drug-shows-promise-for-treating-common-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b2b23b1-902a-4cfb-9c85-0f5c9b411991 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 01:49:00 -0400 Existing drug shows promise for treating common liver disease
新的基因编辑技术为数百万人带来希望由 Mass Eye and Ear 研究人员领导的团队首次证明，通过一种新颖的体内基因组编辑方法，可以在患有由 microRNA 突变引起的遗传性耳聋的成年小鼠模型中成功恢复听力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/New-gene-editing-technique-offers-hope-for-millions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/New-gene-editing-technique-offers-hope-for-millions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a92abe33-b902-4734-9792-f88bc2af2807 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 01:32:54 -0400 New gene editing technique offers hope for millions
肠道细菌代谢的雌马酚显示出预防癌症的希望研究人员回顾了大豆异黄酮如何被肠道细菌代谢为雌马酚，探索其在癌症预防和治疗中的作用。他们检查了分子机制和肠道微生物群，以了解雌马酚的抗肿瘤作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Gut-bacteria-metabolized-equol-shows-promise-in-cancer-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Gut-bacteria-metabolized-equol-shows-promise-in-cancer-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=773ea5d9-8e11-47c5-a41e-f26607a32b2f Thu, 11 Jul 2024 01:27:00 -0400 Gut bacteria-metabolized equol shows promise in cancer prevention
研究发现女性心脏搭桥手术存在差异65 岁以上需要复杂心脏手术的女性比男性更有可能在低质量医院接受护理；密歇根医学的一项研究发现，手术后死亡人数也更多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Study-finds-disparities-in-heart-bypass-surgery-for-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Study-finds-disparities-in-heart-bypass-surgery-for-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a0d3868-8b91-4636-963e-ad17219ef484 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 01:13:00 -0400 Study finds disparities in heart bypass surgery for women
芦荟的药用特性如何使其在医药、化妆品和食品中发挥重要作用全面审查强调了芦荟的多种生物活性及其在医药和化妆品中的潜在应用，同时解决了其安全问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/How-Aloe-veras-medicinal-properties-make-it-essential-in-medicine-cosmetics-and-food-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/How-Aloe-veras-medicinal-properties-make-it-essential-in-medicine-cosmetics-and-food-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=801864b3-2efc-4be9-ac74-6f6246a968c1 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 01:02:00 -0400 How Aloe vera's medicinal properties make it essential in medicine, cosmetics, and food products
COVID-19 封锁减少了儿童喘息和细支气管炎病例在 COVID-19 封锁期间，细支气管炎病例显着下降，从而减少了儿童喘息发作和呼吸道药物的使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/COVID-19-lockdown-reduced-childhood-wheezing-and-bronchiolitis-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/COVID-19-lockdown-reduced-childhood-wheezing-and-bronchiolitis-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b665e7e0-6a0f-4f33-b40c-ca6ca4a49c5f Wed, 10 Jul 2024 23:00:00 -0400 COVID-19 lockdown reduced childhood wheezing and bronchiolitis cases
糖耐量受损诊断后四年非糖尿病状态可降低心血管风险糖耐量受损诊断后至少维持非糖尿病状态四年可显着降低心血管并发症和死亡率的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Four-years-non-diabetic-status-after-impaired-glucose-tolerance-diagnosis-cuts-cardioangio-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Four-years-non-diabetic-status-after-impaired-glucose-tolerance-diagnosis-cuts-cardioangio-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62939b74-f57b-4407-aa66-c61a2f657a10 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 22:42:00 -0400 Four years non-diabetic status after impaired glucose tolerance diagnosis cuts cardiovascular risks
